task_name: Setup: Initialize Next.js project using create-next-app
resource_notes: Foundational setup task for the entire web application.
risk_factors: Incorrect initial configuration could cause downstream issues.

task_name: DevOps: Add jobs for linting, testing, and coverage to CI workflow
resource_notes: Critical for automating quality gates. Requires DevOps expertise.
alternative_approach: Use a different CI/CD provider with migration cost.
risk_factors: Complex workflow configuration may lead to brittle CI pipeline.
mitigation_strategy: Incremental implementation with thorough testing of each job.

resource_notes: Standard UI form development. Must adhere to WCAG 2.1 AA.
mitigation_strategy: Mandatory accessibility audit in PR checklist.

resource_notes: Involves secure token handling and state management.
alternative_approach: Use REST API with higher integration overhead.
risk_factors: Backend API delays (RISK-003); Insecure token storage (RISK-006).
mitigation_strategy: Use MSW for mock API; Mandatory security review of token storage.

task_name: Frontend: Implement Basic Information View/Edit Component
resource_notes: Requires robust handling of view/edit states and client-side validation.
alternative_approach: Use separate pages for view and edit, increasing navigation overhead.
mitigation_strategy: Develop against a mock GraphQL server.

resource_notes: Core page for user engagement. Must handle loading, empty, and error states.
mitigation_strategy: Plan for list virtualization from the start.

resource_notes: Requires implementation of optimistic UI updates for a smooth user experience.
alternative_approach: Simple form submission with page reload, poor UX.
risk_factors: Backend API instability could break optimistic updates.
mitigation_strategy: Implement robust error handling to revert optimistic state.

resource_notes: Complex responsive layout required for desktop (two-pane) and mobile (list-detail).
alternative_approach: Use a library for chat UI, potentially limiting customization.
risk_factors: Complex CSS and responsiveness may lead to visual bugs (RISK-002, RISK-004).
mitigation_strategy: Use visual regression testing in CI; manual testing on multiple devices.

resource_notes: Requires careful handling of popover state and accessibility (focus management).
alternative_approach: Use a full page for notifications instead of a popover.
mitigation_strategy: Encapsulate WebSocket logic in a dedicated service/hook.
